full_summary:
## Air Handling Units Tender
### Tender Announcement

#### Invitation to Bid

**Document Reference Number:** WS3918961023-Doc4113053448
**Procurement Number:** WS3918961023

This tender is open to qualified bidders for the supply of **Air Handling Units**, being an Invitational Procurement.

**Key Details**

* **Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, August 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM (ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Tuesday, July 3, 2023
* **Region(s) of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Tender Background:**

The **Department of Public Works and Government Services** (PSPC), on behalf of the **Correctional Service of Canada** (CSC), invites bids from qualified suppliers to provide **Air Handling Units**.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender falls under the following Trade Agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* ...
  
**Eligibility:**

Any supplier interested in bidding on this tender must be a registered supplier with the [insert contract authority].

**Evaluation Criteria:**

To bid on this project, bidders must meet the following criteria:

* Lowest Price

**Instructions for Bidding:**

To register for the tender, click on the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17052308?extsite=MTcwNTIzMDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**

For any queries or concerns regarding this tender, please contact:

Tony Fong, PSPC (SPAC)
Email: [tony.fong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tony.fong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### How to Bid

For further information and to register for the tender, please visit the webpage provided in the Contact Section.
